e678e985-20b1-4458-8cb2-919720ed093a.label: This segment focuses on the emotional exploitation inherent in network economies, creating an environment where "the sadder the girl, the happier the troll". Ulman intended to make the audience feel profound discomfort for consuming a narrative of self-destruction and desiring another human's sorrow.  (https://deborahschamoni.com/media/pages/artists/amalia-ulman/bbaac4392f-1696952923/amalia-ulman-e-p-press-s.pdf)
